WEBSITE

WE BUILD WEBSITES THAT MAKE CLIENTS HAPPY
(AND VISITORS HAPPIER.)


Your website is where you take your potential customer, client, investor or stakeholder through a specific narrative with a clear end-goal. Be it an e-commerce website, a social networking website or even your company’s public page, the narrative is what determines the engagement and interaction of the visitor or user. Which in turn determines searchability and traffic.

Read More..

A key vertical, therefore, in Trip In - the design + tech studio - is web design and development. And we build websites that are not only great to look at, but also deliver clearly defined outcomes.

- CSS and HTML5 design and development
- Wordpress website development
- E-commerce website design

Read Less..


GET A WEBSITE -

WHY BUILT A WEBSITE
WITH US ?

Design and technology being our core strengths, web design + development is a match made in heaven. At Trip In - the design + tech studio - we’re at our best when weaving together the aesthetic and the functional - design and code working seamlessly and flawlessly together.

When you build your website with Trip In, you sign up our top-notch design and tech brains that always, always team up to deliver much greater than the sum of its parts. Together, our team members have a thorough experience of creating measurably successful and responsive website designs and web applications across a wide range of industries and platforms.

HOW WE DO IT.



This step involves not only defining the problem and setting an expected outcome, but also designing it in a quick turn around cycle.

A prototype website is developed and refined in tandem with design refinements in a rigorously efficient cycle.




Once a working prototype website is ready, it’s rigorously tested on various parameters of form and function.

An iteratively improved, tested and validated website is then implemented. The website is now live.

and many more.

SMART HOME NX





SMART HOME NX

CORPORATE WEBSITE
This was a project for home design consultants where they helped their users discover and install best technology for their home. We made an extensive website (11 unique pages) with a contact form which was a major source of lead generation.It had a very clean UI as it was a pro-tech service. The challenge was to showcase the service using the products that gets installed. We included a basic portfolio of ideas and inspirations implemented before along with a clientele list.






ALL CARGO LOGISTICS

CORPORATE WEBSITE | WEB APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT | INVENTORY TRACKING
All Cargo Logistics is a major player in ImpEx Transport. They have more than 300 clients across globe and are into Over Dimensional Cargo, Project Cargo and Contract Cargo.We created an extensive website with more than 50 unique pages and 100 landing pages. We also integrated their website with their ERP system to enable tracking and tracing of cargo online.

HELPING OUR HEROES




HELPING OUR HEROES

E-COMMERCE WEBSITE DEVELOPMENT
HOH is a platform which offers contemporary, high-quality products of utility, like apparels and accessories, for sale. Part of the proceeds of these sales are donated directly to supporting our nation's heroes. We got a responsive website designed and developed by our team with about us, categories page for men and women, fully responsive for cross- platforms. We also included blogs for SEO. It had a backend panel where user can upload new products along with images
